lesson.title_and_level: Intermediate - A Dad Gives Advice to a Broken-Hearted Son

sentence.idiomatic: Failing one test is not the end of the world, as long as you study harder in the future.

word.literal: to be unable to say for certain

sentence.idiomatic: Actually, becoming a county magistrate is not a big deal. It's not worth envying me over. Maybe someday you might become a mayor.
Don't cry. Losing a cell phone is not the end of the world. I'll buy you a new one tomorrow.

word.literal: in the blink of an eye

sentence.idiomatic: For a period of time the two of them loved all-consumingly, but then in the blink of an eye they broke up.
Every time my tooth hurts so much to the point that it feels like it's the end of the world. I really need to treat it properly.
The day her son was in a car accident, she locked herself up in her room and cried as if it's the end of the world.
When he returned to the village with a success, the people that had once looked down on him lowered their heads.
I really underestimated the opponent. I used to find him unimpressive, never expected that he would defeat me.
Although he doesn't look that special, you shouldn't look down on him. He can definitely succeed in the future.
Everyone envied him for making the campus beauty his girlfriend.
She's not only pretty, but also does well in her studies. She's acknowledged by all as the campus beauty.
They say she was the campus beauty in college. There was a long line of boys wooing her.
Tell me where did your friend go. Otherwise no one will be leaving.
These things should be put in the refrigerator. Otherwise, they will go bad.
I must sleep before ten. Otherwise I'll never be able to get up early tomorrow.
She really obsesses over things. She has to ponder over one small thing for most of the day, and in the end she just comes up with a pile of questions.
Don't obsess over this kind of small problem. There are a lot of important issues waiting for you to solve.
Sometimes obsessing over small things is not bad. His latest invention was a result of all the thought he put into a small problem.
The younger generation, never having been through hardship, cannot understand the thinking of the older generation.
Concern over the next generation's development has become a universally stressed issue.
it's really festive when three generations of relatives come together for a special meal.
Son, it's the weekend, how come you aren't going out?
I'm not in the mood to. Staying at home is pretty nice.
Hey, don't keep on thinking about that Lili. The past is the past, it's not the end of the world.
Dad, you don't understand. Don't talk nonsense.

word.literal: someone who has had a particular experience

sentence.idiomatic: How could I not understand? I am someone who has been there. There are a lot of good girls around, what need is there to be so sad over her?
Dad, you don't get it. I did so much for her, but she... anyways, you won't understand it.
Hey, when I was your age I also went through the agony of love. And later on? We both went our separate ways.
What? Dad, before you were with mom you had another girlfriend?
Heh heh. Don't underestimate your dad. My first love was the campus beauty. Thinking back to that time, other people all felt we were made for each other.
So, how come you didn't end up together?
Oh, there were so many reasons, it's better not to get into it. When I broke up with her I also suffered a lot--but as time passed by, it slowly got better.
Then you definitely didn't truly love her. Otherwise, how could it be possible that you aren't even a little sad?

How could I not be sad? At the time, I was just as sad as you are now. Later I realized that I was really foolish. There are so many people in the world, how could there possibly be only one person right for you? You see, later on I met your mom, and had you. So, don't make things more difficult than they have to be.
Dad, your generation doesn't understand our emotions. Anyways, I'm just really having a tough time right now.

word.literal: to look down upon; to underestimate
to obsess over a small thing
